name: Blind Paint
description:
Blind Paint is a game made in 72 hours by a team of 7 video game students, for ISART Digital's game week. The theme to answer to was "following my calculations, it should be ok".

You're playing a achromat person that doesn't see color, but can hear them (synesthesia sound/color), and you've got to copy famous pictures with shades of grey by using your ears!

This is barely an advanced prototype, but I hope you have a good time :)
